long_description: With its lightweight yet durable fabric, the Marmot Lacey hoodie makes sure that young adventurers stay covered but comfortable while climbing trees, scrambling up rocks or exploring new surroundings. Stretch nylon dries quickly and resists scrapes and snags; hood ensures complete coverage. Fabric provides UPF 50+ sun protection. Marmot Lacey hoodie features a full-length front zipper for easy on/off. Closeout.
short_description: With its lightweight yet durable fabric, the Marmot Lacey hoodie makes sure that young adventurers stay covered but comfortable while climbing trees, scrambling up rocks or exploring new surroundings.
